title: `autocmd! nvim_swapfile` is broken in Neovim 0.11, with no release note acknowledgement
body:
### Problem

[Pull request 25336](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/pull/25336) set Neovim to ignore existing swapfiles when opening, but stated that `autocmd! nvim_swapfile` would restore the old behavior. Version 0.11 breaks that, and nothing in the update notes mentions swapfiles.

Given my `tmux`-powered, scatterbrained workflow, I find the warning quite helpful, as I often don't realize that I already have the file open in a different pane.

### Steps to reproduce

with `vim.cmd('autocmd! nvim_swapfile')` in `init.lua`, launch a Neovim process.

```
Error detected while processing /home/eliminmax/.config/nvim/init.lua:                                                                                                                                               
E5113: Error while calling lua chunk: vim/_editor.lua:0: /home/eliminmax/.config/nvim/init.lua..nvim_exec2() called at /home/eliminmax/.config/nvim/init.lua:0, line 1: Vim(autocmd):E216: No such group or event: nvim_swapfile                                                                                                                                                                                                          
stack traceback:                                                                                                                                                                                                     
        [C]: in function 'nvim_exec2'                                                                                                                                                                                
        vim/_editor.lua: in function 'cmd'                                                                                                                                                                           
        /home/eliminmax/.config/nvim/init.lua:10: in main chunk                                                                                                                                                      
Press ENTER or type command to continue
```

### Expected behavior

`nvim_swapfile` works, or release notes document its removal (and ideally replacement)

### Nvim version (nvim -v)

NVIM v0.11.0; Build type: Release; LuaJIT 2.1.1741730670

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no

### Operating system/version

Debian 12

### Terminal name/version

kitty 0.26.5, xterm 379-a

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-kitty, xterm

### Installation

Release tarball
